name: Carrot Seed Design System V1.0
description:
Carrot Seed Design System is an easily adaptable design system based on material design with components for web and mobile applications.


It includes:

  • Typography
  • Colors
  • Buttons
  • Form and Selection Controls
  • Tables
  • Navigation
  • and more


Weâ€™ve created this as a companion for Carrot Seed Saas Kit, our always up-to-date code foundation that lets you build a SaaS product in minutes. Carrot Seed users get access to everything in here as ready-to-implement code blocks.


Premium version coming soon.
